title: China's Xi Jinping Rewrites History to Secure His Political Future
content:
1. China's Xi Jinping Rewrites History to Secure His Political Future  Bloomberg
  2. China's Xi Jinping Remakes Party History: Live Updates  The New York Times
  3. China's Xi Jinping gets 'historical resolution' to entrench his rule at party plenum  NBC News
  4. China's Xi Jinping cements his status with historic resolution  BBC News
  5. China passes resolution clearing way for Xi Jinping to rule until at least 2027  The Washington Post

localize.title: 中国の習近平は歴史を書き換えて自分の政治的未来を確保する
